NK014(pha)007:0: sgyu 'phrul d+r+wa ba khro bo'i dkyil 'khor la brten
NK014(pha)007:1: pa'i zhi ba'i sbyin sreg bsnyen pa'i kha skong gi
NK014(pha)007:2: ched du byas pa nyi ma'i 'od zer zhes bya
NK014(pha)007:3: ba bzhugs so // he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK014(pha)007:4: 'dir sgyu 'phrul khro bo'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga bklag chog mar bkod pa /
NK014(pha)007:5: lo chen rin po che'i gsung sor bzhag las /
NK014(pha)007:6: mdun dkyil dang ma 'brel ba bsnyen pa'i kha skong
NK014(pha)007:7: sogs kyi ched du zhi ba'i sregs blugs kyi kha
NK014(pha)007:8: bsgyur cung zad bgyis te bri'o //
NK014(pha)007:9: de la thog mar bcas bshoms ni /
NK014(pha)007:10: thab stegs gru bzhir rgyar khru do dang dpangs khru
NK014(pha)007:11: phyed pa'i khar dri dkar po dang ba byung gi
NK014(pha)007:12: chag chag btab / de'i ngos kyi mtha' nas zlum
NK014(pha)007:13: skor gyi mu khyud nag po la h'u yig dang
NK014(pha)007:14: seng mgo spel ba'i nang du 'khor lo dkar po
NK014(pha)007:16: de'i lte bar thab khung brtsig na rgyar khru gang
NK014(pha)007:17: dang dpangs su khru phyed zlum por bslang ba'i steng
NK014(pha)007:18: nas phyir 'gyed pa'i sor bzhi'i tshad can gyi kha
NK014(pha)007:19: khyer bang rim gsum pa nang nas rim par 'khor
NK014(pha)007:20: lo lcags kyu 'od phreng gis bskor ba'i dbus su
NK014(pha)007:21: srab 'thug sor gang tsam pa'i thab mtshan 'khor lo
NK014(pha)007:22: h'u yig gis mtshan pa ste /
NK014(pha)007:23: thams cad kyang tshon dkar pos bri bar bya'o //
NK014(pha)007:24: gang ltar yang 'o ma can gyi shing rtse mo'i cha las byung ba'am /
NK014(pha)007:25: dgon pa'i ba lci skam po srog chags med pas
NK014(pha)007:26: thab nang du thab las cung zad dma' ba'i zlum
NK014(pha)007:27: por brtsigs pa'i shar lhor me tshang bca' /
NK014(pha)007:28: stegs bu'i grar mda' bzhi btsugs pa srad bu dkar
NK014(pha)007:29: po bsnol mar bran cing steng nas me dar dkar
NK014(pha)007:30: po dgab / stegs bu'i shar lho'i zur du mda' dar dmar po gzug /
NK014(pha)007:31: thab kyi mdun du stan dkar zhing 'jam pa dang /
NK014(pha)007:32: de'i g.yas g.yon du khru gang ba'i tshad kyis rdzas
NK014(pha)007:33: stegs dang mchod stegs dkar po ste gsum ka la
NK014(pha)007:34: sna tshogs pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa re bri /
NK014(pha)007:35: stan gyi mdun du zheng mtho gang dang dpangs slob
NK014(pha)007:36: dpon gyi sked pa tsam sleb pa'i me yol gangs
NK014(pha)007:38: g.yas phyogs rdzas stegs kyi pad+ma'i lte bar ba las
NK014(pha)007:39: byung ba'i mar khu dgang blugs kyi gzar bu kha
NK014(pha)007:41: mdun gyi 'dab mar 'o ma can gyi rtse mo'i
NK014(pha)007:42: cha las byung ba'i yam shing mtho gang brtse gnyis
NK014(pha)007:48: 'bras dkar gyi chan sogs kha zas dkar po dang /
NK014(pha)007:49: tsan+dana dkar po sogs dri dkar po'i rigs dang /
NK014(pha)007:50: tsam pa ka sogs me tog dkar po'i rigs te
NK014(pha)007:51: thams cad rang bzhin nam bcos pas dkar ba 'das
NK014(pha)007:52: ma 'das kyi khyad par gyi phyi nang nyis rim
NK014(pha)007:53: dang thugs dam bskul ba'i rdzas yungs kar rnams rin
NK014(pha)007:54: po che dkar po'i snod du bsham /
NK014(pha)007:55: g.yon phyogs mchod stegs kyi pad+ma'i lte bar /
NK014(pha)007:57: 'bras chan dngul phye me tog dkar po rnams bsres
NK014(pha)007:58: pa'i mar dkar gyi 'das gtor zlum po ril bu
NK014(pha)007:59: drug gis bskor ba many+dzi'i steng bkod pa'i mdun du
NK014(pha)007:60: rgyu de las 'jig rten pa'i gtor ma dkar zlum
NK014(pha)007:61: / bdun gyi pad 'dab la rdor dril /
NK014(pha)007:62: de yi g.yas g.yon gyi 'dab mar sman raka /
NK014(pha)007:63: pad 'dab lhag ma lnga la zhabs bsil dang bzhi
NK014(pha)007:64: bsnol gyi mchod rdzas rang bzhin nam bcos pas dkar
NK014(pha)007:65: ba g.yas bskor du bshams shing las bum kyang ci
NK014(pha)007:66: bder bzhag go // de ltar shoms zin nas cho ga ni /
NK014(pha)007:67: slob dpon chas gos dang rin po che'i rgyan dkar
NK014(pha)007:68: pos brgyan la rdo rje'i skyil krung gis shis pa'i
NK014(pha)007:69: phyogs su kha bltas pas 'dug nas /
NK014(pha)007:70: don gyi sems chos thams cad kyi gshis lugs lhag
NK014(pha)007:71: pa bden pa dbyer med kyi lta ba rtogs shing
NK014(pha)007:72: byang chub kyi sems dang ldan pas /
NK014(pha)007:73: kun slong stongs kyi sems rang gzhan gyi gnod sdig
NK014(pha)007:74: sel bar 'dod pa'i sems zhi zhing dang ba'i sgo
NK014(pha)007:75: nas / ngag sngags rnams phra zhing zhib la rgyun
NK014(pha)007:76: mi chad par bzla ba'i tshul gyis cho ga'i las
NK014(pha)007:77: nas / la 'jug ste / bud+d+ha sh+r+ai he ru ka h'u /
NK014(pha)007:78: zhes pas rang nyid bud+d+ha he ru ka zhal gcig
NK014(pha)007:79: phyag gnyis pa'i rnam pas dkyil 'khor gyi shar sgo'i
NK014(pha)007:80: thad du 'khod de sbyin sreg gi las riim la
NK014(pha)007:82: rdo rje thabs kyi rang bzhin ye shes lnga'i ngo bo dang /
NK014(pha)007:83: dril bu shes rab kyi rang bzhin stong nyid chos kyi sgra dbyangs sgrogs pa /
NK014(pha)007:84: gnyis ka'ang don dam pa'i byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin du mos pa brtan par byas la /
NK014(pha)007:86: zhes pas rdo rje gsor zhing thugs kar 'dzin /
NK014(pha)007:88: dril bu dkrol zhing dkur brten /
NK014(pha)007:89: sarba ta th+aa ga ta ma h+aa a nu r+aa ga na badz+ra swa b+h+aa wa +aat+ma ko&a ham /
NK014(pha)007:90: zhes pas 'khyud rgya byas te dam tshig gsum dran par bya'o //
NK014(pha)007:91: de nas phyi mchod rnams sgrub thabs ltar brlab cing /
NK014(pha)007:92: sman raka gnyis sngags tsam gyis byin gyis brlab bo //
NK014(pha)007:93: las gtor dang sreg rdzas rnams la las bum gyi chu 'thor zhing /
NK014(pha)007:96: stong pa'i ngang las ma dang a las nyi zla'i
NK014(pha)007:97: gwa'u'i snod du rang gi thugs ka nas gtor ma'i
NK014(pha)007:98: gnas su 'bru gsum dang sreg rdzas kyi gnas su
NK014(pha)007:99: h'u lnga spros te 'phro 'dus yongs su gyur pa
NK014(pha)007:100: las zhi ba'i las gtor rin po che'i mchod sdong
NK014(pha)007:102: sreg rdzas rnams ro brgya ldan pa'i zag med ye
NK014(pha)007:103: shes kyi bdud rtsi nam mkha' gang bas zhi ba'i
NK014(pha)007:104: las sgrub pa la thogs pa med pa'i nus pa
NK014(pha)007:108: zhes bzlas pas byin gyis brlab /
NK014(pha)007:110: stong pa'i ngang las mdun du b+h+r+aum yig 'phro 'dus
NK014(pha)007:111: yongs su gyur pa las 'khor lo'i lte ba la
NK014(pha)007:112: gnas pa'i zhi ba'i thab khung dkar zhing zlum pa
NK014(pha)007:113: kha khyer bang rim gsum dang ldan pa 'od zer
NK014(pha)007:115: rang gi thugs ka nas ram yig thab nang du
NK014(pha)007:116: spros pa'i ye shes kyi me 'od dkar po 'bar
NK014(pha)007:117: bar bsam la / ag+ne ye dz+wa la dz+wa la h+aum phata /
NK014(pha)007:118: ces rgyun bzhag gam gtsub shing las byung ba'i me du ba med pa sbar la /
NK014(pha)007:119: thab kyi me'i dbus su ma dang d+aihls byung ba'i
NK014(pha)007:120: nyi ma dang ra skyes kyi gdan la yig dkar
NK014(pha)007:121: po 'phro 'dus yongs su gyur pa las ag+ne de
NK014(pha)007:122: wa ri shi h'u zhi ba'i me lha dkar po
NK014(pha)007:123: zhi zhing 'dzum pa drang srong gi cha byad can
NK014(pha)007:124: gun+d+he dang bgrang phreng 'dzin pa'i skur gyur /
NK014(pha)007:125: a dar+sha sogs kyis bskur brlab /
NK014(pha)007:126: thugs ka'i h'u las 'od zer 'phros pas shar lho nas me lha 'khor bcas bzhengs par bsam la /
NK014(pha)007:127: ag+ne de wa sa ma ya h'u dzah zhes se gol bsnol mar gdab /
NK014(pha)007:128: mda' dar dmar pos g.yab cing /
NK014(pha)007:130: dad pa dang ni dam tshig gis //
NK014(pha)007:131: tshur gshegs tshur gshegs 'byung po che //
NK014(pha)007:132: me lha drang srong bram ze mchog /
NK014(pha)007:133: 'di nyid du ni gshegs su gsol //
NK014(pha)007:134: lcags kyu'i phyag rgya dang bcas /
NK014(pha)007:135: ag+ne de wa ri shi dzahdzahsa spyan drangs /
NK014(pha)007:137: kun bzang zhabs bsil bzhi bsnol gyis mchod /
NK014(pha)007:138: me lha'i zhal cung zad gdangs pas sreg blugs kyi bdud rtsi'i rgyun drangs nas gsol bar bsam la /
NK014(pha)007:139: lag gnyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i khu tshur du byas pas dgang blugs bzung nas /
NK014(pha)007:141: zhes g.yas pa'i blugs gzar bdun gyis g.yon pa'i dgang
NK014(pha)007:142: gzar bkang ste rjes gzar bu kha sbyar nas pus
NK014(pha)007:143: mo'i nang las mi 'da' bas g.yas bskor gyis /
NK014(pha)007:144: ag+ne de wa ri shi ha bya ka bya di
NK014(pha)007:145: bya bdag cag dpon slob 'khor dang bcas pa'i nad
NK014(pha)007:146: gdon sdig sgrib bar chad mi mthun pa'i phyogs thams
NK014(pha)007:147: cad sh+ain+tam ku ru ye s+w+aa h+aa /
NK014(pha)007:148: zhes lan gsum gyis dgang blugs phul /
NK014(pha)007:149: de rjes sngags kho nas yam shing /
NK014(pha)007:150: mar khu sreg rdzas rnams re re nas lnga'am bdun sogs grangs ji ltar rig pa phul la /
NK014(pha)007:152: tshangs pa 'jig rten mgon gyi sras //
NK014(pha)007:153: me lha'i rgyal po drang srong mchog /
NK014(pha)007:154: 'byung po yongs su skyob pa'i phyir //
NK014(pha)007:155: thugs rje'i dbang gis skur sprul pa //
NK014(pha)007:156: rig sngags grub pa drang srong tshul //
NK014(pha)007:157: nyon mongs sreg pa'i shes rab 'od //
NK014(pha)007:158: bskal pa'i me bzhin gzi brjid 'bar //
NK014(pha)007:159: mngon shes rdzu 'phrul zhabs dang ldan //
NK014(pha)007:160: thabs kyi sprul pa'i theg pa chibs //
NK014(pha)007:161: bgrang phreng 'dzin cing rig sngags gsung //
NK014(pha)007:162: bdud rtsi'i bcud can gun+d+he bsnams //
NK014(pha)007:163: chos kyi bdud rtsi yongs la bsil //
NK014(pha)007:164: nyes pa'i skyon bral tshangs par spyod //
NK014(pha)007:166: zhi ba brnyes kyang thugs rje che //
NK014(pha)007:167: de la bstod de phyag kyang 'tshal //
NK014(pha)007:170: na mo rig pa'i rgyal po khyod kyis las thams
NK014(pha)007:171: cad byed pas bsreg rdzas lha'i zhal du 'bul ba
NK014(pha)007:172: dang / me nyid ye shes kyi mer byin gyis
NK014(pha)007:173: brlabs nas bdag cag dpon slob 'khor dang bcas pa'i
NK014(pha)007:174: nad gdon sdig sgrib thams cad zhi ba'i phrin las
NK014(pha)007:175: dang / mdzad du gsol // zhes 'dod gsol /
NK014(pha)007:176: de nas 'das pa'i sreg lha mchod pa ni /
NK014(pha)007:177: me lha'i lto ba yangs shing rgya che ba'i dbus
NK014(pha)007:178: su b+h+r+aum yig 'phro 'dus yongs su gyur pa las
NK014(pha)007:179: / b+h+r+aum bi shwa bi shud+d+he ye shes rin po
NK014(pha)007:180: che'i rang bzhin b+hany+dza 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang gru
NK014(pha)007:182: phyi nang nyis rim 'bar ba'i bar khyams gnyis dang
NK014(pha)007:183: ldan pa'i lha gnas rnams so so'i gdan dang bcas
NK014(pha)007:187: dbang phyug lha chen la sogs bzung //
NK014(pha)007:188: zhes pa'i bar gyis gsal btab la /
NK014(pha)007:189: bdag gi thugs ka nas rigs lnga'i he ru ka'i gnas su h'u yig zung lnga /
NK014(pha)007:190: khro mo brgyad kyi gnas su ha brgyad /
NK014(pha)007:191: phra men brgyad kyi gnas su he brgyad /
NK014(pha)007:192: sgo ma bzhi'i gnas su phata bzhi /
NK014(pha)007:193: dbang mo rnams kyi gnas su b+h+yo nyi shu rtsa
NK014(pha)007:194: brgyad rnams spros te so so'i gdan la 'khod par
NK014(pha)007:197: 'od zer spro bsdus yongs su gyur pa las /
NK014(pha)007:198: bud+d+ha sh+r+ai he ru ka h'u /
NK014(pha)007:202: bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po bud+d+ha he ru
NK014(pha)007:203: ka la sogs te lnga bcu rtsa brgyad khrag 'thung
NK014(pha)007:204: rol pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha tshogs thams cad sku
NK014(pha)007:205: mdog dkar po g.yas 'khor lo dang g.yon rang rtags
NK014(pha)007:206: 'chang ba so so'i gdan la bzhugs pa'i sku las
NK014(pha)007:207: 'od zer dkar po'i phreng ba mkha' khyab tu spro
NK014(pha)007:208: bas zhi ba'i phrin las mdzad par bsam la /
NK014(pha)007:209: smug nag sngo nag ser nag dang //
NK014(pha)007:211: ci bgyi zhes ni chas te gnas //
NK014(pha)007:212: zhes pa'i bar gyis gsal btab la /
NK014(pha)007:213: rigs lnga'i dbang rgya gnas so sor bzhag ste /
NK014(pha)007:214: ma h+aa sh+au nya t+aa dz+ny+aa na badz+ra swa b+h+aa +aat+ma ko&a ham /
NK014(pha)007:216: ma h+aa a dar+sha dz+ny+aa na ma h+aa sa ma
NK014(pha)007:217: t+aa ma h+aa pra t+ya bek+sha na ma h+aa kri
NK014(pha)007:218: t+y+aa nush+th+aa na rdo rje'i phyag rgya gnas gsum du
NK014(pha)007:219: bzhag la / sarba ta th+aa ga ta ma h+aa k+aa ya badz+ra swa b+h+aa wa +aat+ma ko&a ham /
NK014(pha)007:221: w+aa ka tsit+ta zhes brjod cing sku gsung thugs rdo rje gsum du nga rgyal bya'o //
NK014(pha)007:222: thugs ka'i h'u las 'od zer 'phros pas rang bzhin
NK014(pha)007:223: gyi gnas nas ye shes kyi 'khor lo spyan drangs
NK014(pha)007:225: he ru ka yi gnas bcu dang //
NK014(pha)007:226: dur khrod chen po'i gnas brgyad nas //
NK014(pha)007:228: dur khrod chen po'i gnas 'di ru //
NK014(pha)007:229: zhing chen gsar rnying stan du bting //
NK014(pha)007:230: dmar gyi ar+g+ham rgya mtshor bskyil //
NK014(pha)007:232: ma lus gshegs nas bsnams su gsol //
NK014(pha)007:234: e h+ye hi +aa na ya dzahmh'u bam hoh zhes
NK014(pha)007:235: dam tshig pa dang dbyer med du bstim par bsam
NK014(pha)007:239: dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams kyi ljags rdo rje'i 'od
NK014(pha)007:240: kyi sbu gu can gyis sreg blugs kyi bdud rtsi'i
NK014(pha)007:241: rgyun drangs nas gsol bar bsam la /
NK014(pha)007:242: bud+d+ha sh+r+ai he ru h'u zhes bdun gyis bkang ba'i dgang blugs kha sbyar ba /
NK014(pha)007:243: ru lu ru lu h+aum b+h+yo h+aum /
NK014(pha)007:244: zhes spel tshig sngar ltar btags pas lan gsum phul /
NK014(pha)007:245: de nas yam shing dang mar khu sogs bsreg rdzas
NK014(pha)007:246: gzhan rnams kyang ru lu kho nas gtso 'khor spyir
NK014(pha)007:247: bargya'am nyer gcig sogs bcu tshan lta bu'i mtshams ji
NK014(pha)007:248: ltar rigs par spel tshig spel nas phul lo //
NK014(pha)007:249: gsungs pas bsnyen pa'i kha skong la /
NK014(pha)007:250: rnal 'byor pa bdag gi rtsa ba dang yan lag
NK014(pha)007:251: gi dam tshig nyams chag dang 'gal 'khrul du gyur
NK014(pha)007:252: pa / lha nye bar ma sgom pa /
NK014(pha)007:253: snying po dag par ma bgrangs pa /
NK014(pha)007:256: ting nge 'dzin thang lhod du gyur pa la sogs
NK014(pha)007:257: pa'i nyams shing zhig ral tu gyur pa ci mchis
NK014(pha)007:258: pa thams cad sh+ain+tam ku ru s+w+aa h+aa /
NK014(pha)007:260: ma h+aa ba ling+ta kh+aa hi /
NK014(pha)007:261: btags pas 'das pa'i las gtor dang /
NK014(pha)007:263: ma h+aa pany+tsa a mri ta kh+aa his sman raka bran la /
NK014(pha)007:265: gtum chen dus mtha'i me ltar 'bar //
NK014(pha)007:269: ye shes klongs yangs 'khyil ba'i hom khung du //
NK014(pha)007:270: dam rdzas bdud rtsi 'bar ba'i sbyin sreg 'bul //
NK014(pha)007:271: bdag gis zhi ba'i phrin las mthar phyin nas //
NK014(pha)007:272: sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub thob par mdzod //
NK014(pha)007:273: ces gsol ba btab pas lha tshogs rnams kyi sku las 'od zer dkar po 'phros /
NK014(pha)007:274: bsgrub bya la reg pas nad gdon sdig sgrib thams cad zhi bar bsam /
NK014(pha)007:275: de nas gtang rag gi mchod bstod dang bzod gsol byas la /
NK014(pha)007:276: ye shes pa rang bzhiin gyi gnas su gshegs /
NK014(pha)007:277: dam tshig pa gzhal yas khang gdan dang bcas pa rang la thim par bsam mo //
NK014(pha)007:279: ag+ne ye dz+wa la dz+wa la h'u phata /
NK014(pha)007:280: ces blugs gzar gyis mar khu phul bas me gsos te /
NK014(pha)007:281: 'jig rten pa'i me lha sngar bzhin gsal bar bsam la /
NK014(pha)007:282: ag+ne de wa ri shi ha bya sogs kyis bsreg rdzas lhag rnams phul /
NK014(pha)007:284: ag+ne de wa ri shi ma h+aa ba ling+ta kh+aa hi /
NK014(pha)007:286: ma h+aa pany+tsa a mri ta kh+aa his las gtor dang sman raka phul /
NK014(pha)007:289: badz+ra muhs me lha ye shes pa rang gnas su gshegs /
NK014(pha)007:290: dam tshig pa 'bar ba'i rnam par gyur par bsam la /
NK014(pha)007:291: las kyi rjes bsdu zhing bsngo shis kyis mtha' brgyan par bya'o //
NK014(pha)007:292: de ltar sbyin sreg zin nas las kyi mjug bsdu tshul ni /
NK014(pha)007:294: long med na 'o ma dang dri dkar pos gzhil bar byas nas thal ba 'bab chur bskyal lo //
NK014(pha)007:295: ces pa 'di ni rang dang skal mnyam gyi gang
NK014(pha)007:296: zag cho ga'i lag len la cher ma 'dris pa
NK014(pha)007:297: 'ga' zhig la nyer mkho'i ched du pad+ma badz+ra pas
